name: The Arena of Death
overview: Welcome! You have just been enlisted by the Governor to serve as a gladiator in the Arena of Death. You may select your own weapons and armor based on the scores you select for your Strength, Stamina and Sill. Your strength determines the amount of damage you are capable of inflicting. Skill is your ability to hit your opponent, while your own ability to survive being hit is reflected by your stamina. You may wear armor, but you will find that it hinders your fighting ability. You will have 100 points to assign to your attributes to start with.
